SQL: SELECT REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.UUID, REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.STORAGEID, REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.SUBNAME, REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.UNIT, REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.SCRAPTOTAL, REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.SCRAPCAUSE, REP_STORAGE_DETAIL.AMOUNT, REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.Messageid FROM REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA LEFT JOIN REP_SUBSTANCE_STORAGE ON REP_SUBSTANCE_STORAGE.STORAGE_NUMBER = REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.STORAGEID LEFT JOIN REP_STORAGE_DETAIL ON REP_SUBSTANCE_STORAGE.UUID = REP_STORAGE_DETAIL.NUMBERID and REP_STORAGE_DETAIL.Messageid = REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.Messageid WHERE REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.ISDELETED=0 AND REP_SUBSTANCE_SCRAPDETA.REPOSITORYID = '${uuid}'
